nodes.text: The Pioku system was a star system that was located within the Expansion Region's Trans-Jardeen sector. The system shared its name with the conflict known as the Pioku Border Wars, which were fought at some point between 19 BBY and 0 BBY.
The Pioku system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square K-15.
